original_text: A person who tells lies in court. A person who causes trouble in a family. A person who tells lies in court.
korean_text: 거짓을 말하는 망령된 증인과 및 형제 사이를 이간하는 자이니라

sentences.original_text: A person who tells lies in court
A person who causes trouble in a family
A person who tells lies in court
